description.en: Relevant is an app for curating information based on quality, not clicks. Relevant uses a reputation system and economic incentives to encourage users to rank and organize content within topic-based communities. It’s based on the principle of inclusive hierarchy — anyone can participate but not everyone’s vote holds the same weight.
